text: Eugène Van Roosbroeck (13 May 1928 – 28 March 2018) was a Belgian racing cyclist. He was born in Noorderwijk (Antwerp province). He won a gold medal in team road race at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London, together with Lode Wouters and Leon De Lathouwer. Roosbroeck died on 28 March 2018 in Noorderwijk at the age of 89.Oudste Belgische goudenmedaillewinnaar overleden ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Olympic gold medalists for Belgium Category:People from Antwerp (province)
title: Eugène Van Roosbroeck
